instruction: Given a user with diabetes (Adult), Halal diet, no peanuts/tree nuts, cultural preference MiddleEastern HomeCooking, budget Low, pantry: lentils, tomatoes, onion. Plan 1 day of meals and build a Walmart cart.
Create a 4-week beginner strength plan for a Senior (65+) with knee issues. Include warm-up/cooldown and avoid deep knee flexion. Link protein guidance.
User is Celiac, Kosher, and wants a Caribbean-inspired weekly meal plan with Walmart cart under $80. Include at least 2 vegan dinners.
